conversations.body_text: Hello, we have arranged for the reshipment of your Haptics Reactor.  However, for the pedal reshipment, you will need to contact DHL directly. Here is your DHL tracking number: CE326624655DE  Phone: +31 88-055 2000

Hello,

What do you mean with this?
I dont know how to contact them.
I did not order pedals at dhl but i ordered it at simsonn. 
So i ask you kindly to re-send my order or please refund my money.
I hope to hear from you soon.

Kind regards,

Erik van Empelen

> Op 29 sep 2025 om 12:46 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:
> 
> ﻿
> Hello, we have arranged for the reshipment of your Haptics Reactor.
> However, for the pedal reshipment, you will need to contact DHL directly. Here is your DHL tracking number: CE326624655DE
> Phone: +31 88-055 2000
> 4238:4206036

Hello, we face time zone and language barriers with our local DHL partner in the Netherlands, so we can only communicate via email, which causes significant delays. Therefore, we typically ask customers to call and request a reshipment themselves. We hope you understand. If you prefer not to, we will handle the communication with them via email.

Goodmorning,

Thanks for replying my email regarding my order.

In the dhl.de app i can see that my order has been send back to the sender.
I dont mind contacting dhl.nl but they dont have my package because it has been send back to sender.
I guess the package now is at your office.
So… if i call dhl.nl…. What can is say to them?

Kind regards,

Erik

> Op 30 sep 2025 om 06:09 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:
> 
> ﻿
> Hello, we face time zone and language barriers with our local DHL partner in the Netherlands, so we can only communicate via email, which causes significant delays. Therefore, we typically ask customers to call and request a reshipment themselves. We hope you understand. If you prefer not to, we will handle the communication with them via email.
> 4238:4206036

Goodday,

I have contacted dhl in the netherlands but they say they couldn’t help me further.
So… can you help me further?

Kind regards,

Erik van Empelen

Hi Gmail,    We are currently on the National Day holiday (October 1st–8th), so our customer service response may be slower than usual. I noticed that you have sent 19 identical emails. Please rest assured that as soon as we receive the latest logistics updates, we will reply to you promptly.

Hello!
But when is my order coming?
